```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
library(gridExtra)
library(ggplot2)
library(knitr)

load(file = "Tabellen/Tabellen_S1_S4_S7.RData")
load(file = "Tabellen/Tabellen_S2_S5_S8.RData")
load(file = "Tabellen/Tabellen_S3_S6_S9.RData")
create_inner_table <- function(data) {
  return(kable(data, format = "latex", booktabs = TRUE, linesep = "", row.names = TRUE))
}

# Tabelle als LaTeX-String erstellen
table_content <- paste0(
  "\\begin{table}[h]\n",
  "\\centering\n",
  "\\begin{tabular}{|c|c|c|c|}\n",
  "\\hline\n",
  "& \\textbf{linear} & \\textbf{polynomial} & \\textbf{radial} \\\\\n",
  "\\hline\n",
  # p << n
  "\\multirow{5}{*}{\\textbf{p << n}} & ",
  create_inner_table(S1_Tabelle), " & ",
  create_inner_table(S4_Tabelle), " & ",
  create_inner_table(S7_Tabelle), " \\\\\n",
  "\\hline\n",
  # p = n
  "\\multirow{5}{*}{\\textbf{p = n}} & ",
  create_inner_table(S2_Tabelle), " & ",
  create_inner_table(S5_Tabelle), " & ",
  create_inner_table(S8_Tabelle), " \\\\\n",
  "\\hline\n",
  # p >> n
  "\\multirow{5}{*}{\\textbf{p >> n}} & ",
  create_inner_table(S3_Tabelle), " & ",
  create_inner_table(S6_Tabelle), " & ",
  create_inner_table(S9_Tabelle), " \\\\\n",
  "\\hline\n",
  "\\end{tabular}\n",
  "\\caption{Tabelle 2: Vergleich der Modelle}\n",
  "\\end{table}\n"
)

# Ausgabe der Tabelle
cat(table_content)
```
